special_powers.name: I CAN FIX THIS!
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Ms. Kang uses it, after rolling you may KO any number of friendly Chronal Echo bystanders to increase the result by X where X is the number of Chronal Echo bystanders you KO'd.

special_powers.name: I KNOW THIS HAPPENS...
special_powers.description: Probability Control. When Ms. Kang uses it, after resolutions you may generate a Chronal Echo bystander [MAX 3].

special_powers.name: THIS IS ALL WRONG!
special_powers.description: STOP. Barrier. // When Ms. Kang would take damage from an attack, you may instead KO a friendly Chronal Echo bystander within range and then place Ms. Kang in the square it last occupied.

special_powers.name: ...JUST NOT NOW
special_powers.description: Probability Control, but only if no friendly character named Chronal Echo has used Probability Control this turn.

special_powers.name: THE MADDER I GET, THE SMALLER I GET
special_powers.description: When Little Monster hits or is hit, give him a Jade Germ token. // Little Monster can use the following effects based on the number of his Jade Germ tokens:

special_powers.name: GAMMA GRENADE
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry. // When an adjacent friendly character makes a range attack, after resolutions you may place Little Monster adjacent to a hit target.

special_powers.name: SMASH PUNY ATOMS!
special_powers.description: CLOSE: Destroy all blocking terrain within 3 squares and make a close attack targeting all opposing characters within 3 squares. Each hit character is dealt 3 damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: LAW SCHOOL IN MY MIND, GREEN ROOM TRAINING IN MY BLOOD
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a set of colors and then choose one standard power matching each color. Green Widow can use the chosen powers until your next turn:

special_powers.name: I MAKE MY OWN COVER
special_powers.description: Leap/Climb. // When Green Widow is given a MOVE action, after resolutions generate a hindering terrain marker in her square and, if she moved 5 squares or less, she may make an attack.

special_powers.name: GAMMA-POWERED GRAPPLING
special_powers.description: KNOCKBACK. // When Green Widow knocks back one or more characters, she may choose the direction of the knockback and, after resolutions, you may place her adjacent to a character she knocked back.

special_powers.name: SUPREME STRATEGIST
special_powers.description: When Dormammu Red hits, give him a Plotting token. // Dormammu Red considers characters within X squares to be adjacent, where X is the number of his Plotting tokens.

special_powers.name: PRIEST OF HELL
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind, Poison. When Dormammu Red uses Leadership and succeeds, you may also generate a Avengers Forever #003 Hydra Agent on click #1 or a Avengers Forever #007 Mindless Once on click #1. If a 6 was rolled, you may instead generate both.

special_powers.name: DRAG YOU TO THE DARK DIMENSION
special_powers.description: Invincible. // When Dormammu Red is hit by an attack, the attacker immediately gains Immobile until your next turn, even if this power is lost.

special_powers.name: MY PERFECT PLAN, PERFECTLY EXECUTED
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex. // When Dormammu Red hits with an attack, you may remove up to 3 Plotting tokens and increase the damage dealt this attack by the amount of Plotting tokens removed.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD'S MOST WANTED ARCHAEOLOGIST
special_powers.description: Once per game, FREE: If Invincible Ant-Man occupies an opponent's starting area, you may equip him with an equipment from your Sideline of 10 points or less.

special_powers.name: SHRINK AND STRIKE
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport. When Invincible Ant-Man uses it and moves 5 squares or less, after resolutions he may make a close attack.

special_powers.name: DOOM'S AVENGERS
special_powers.description: Other friendly characters with Avengers team ability have Minions of Doom team ability.

special_powers.name: MY DINNER WAS TOUGHER THAN YOU!
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection, Invincible.

special_powers.name: NO MAN LEFT BEHIND, SOLDIER!
special_powers.description: Leadership. When U.S. Agent uses it, if a friendly character was KO'd since your last turn he succeeds on all results except a 1.

special_powers.name: ATOMIC STEED
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed.

special_powers.name: THE SHIELD OF NIGHT PROTECTS ME
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes, Super Senses.

special_powers.name: HONOR BOUND TO NOT KILL
special_powers.description: Close Combat Expert. // Black Knight modifies his attack +1 for each of his Mercy tokens. // When Black Knight hits with a close attack and does not KO any of his targets, after resolutions choose one:

special_powers.name: TRAINING THE THUNDERBOLTS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a copyable team ability an opposing character can use. This game, friendly characters with the Thunderbolts keyword can use that team ability.

special_powers.name: TRICK SHOTS FROM THE SKY-CYCLE
special_powers.description: When Hawkeye hits, give him a Bullseye! token. // Hawkeye modifies his attack and defense +1 for each of his Bullseye! tokens. // FREE: If Hawkeye has 3 or more Bullseye! tokens, choose a standard power on his card. He can use that power until you choose again.

special_powers.name: DIPLOMATIC IMMUNITY
special_powers.description: If Black Panther has been attacked this turn, he has SAFEGUARD: Outwit and can't be targeted by range attacks. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: FROM THE TREETOPS
special_powers.description: Stealth. // FREE: If Black Panther occupies hindering terrain, place him in a square within 4 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: NINE LIVES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, give Tigra 9 Lives tokens. // FREE: Remove any number of Lives tokens to heal Tigra that many clicks.

special_powers.name: I TIDIED UP
special_powers.description: FREE: Remove a non-debris terrain marker within 4 squares.

special_powers.name: THE HEART OF THE AVENGERS
special_powers.description: If Jarvis is adjacent to a friendly character with the Avengers keyword, he takes a maximum of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: BACKUP HAS ARRIVED
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a friendly character of 50 points or more with the S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword rolls for Leadership and succeeds and a 6 was rolled, they may instead generate Agent Coulson from your Sideline on click #1.

special_powers.name: I KEEP THE BEST TECH FOR MYSELF
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Agent Coulson uses it he may also deal his printed damage value to hit characters given an action token.

special_powers.name: LEVEL 7 AGENT
special_powers.description: Leadership, Outwit. When Agent Coulson uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a Avengers Forever #002 S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative on click #1.

special_powers.name: CHIEF SECURITY OFFICER OF K.N.O.W.H.E.R.E., AND I SAID NO!!
special_powers.description: Mind Control. // POWER: Choose a standard power. Until your next turn, Cosmo has: "Opposing characters within range can't use the chosen power."

special_powers.name: SIT!!
special_powers.description: Outwit. When Cosmo uses it, the targeted character gains Immobile until your next turn.

special_powers.name: INSPIRATIONAL PARAGON
special_powers.description: When Captain America removes an action token from a friendly character (including himself) when using Leadership or Willpower, after resolutions you may heal that character 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: SHIELD RICOCHET
special_powers.description: Improved Targeting: Hindering, Elevated, Characters.

special_powers.name: ENVELOP IN DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Stealth. Smoke Cloud as FREE.

special_powers.name: DARKFORCE MANIPULATION
special_powers.description: Toughness. // FREE: Replace up to three unoccupied hindering terrain markers generated by Darkstar with blocking terrain markers. These markers are removed when the hindering terrain markers would have been removed.

special_powers.name: HUNGRY FOR BATTLE
special_powers.description: Ursa Major modifies his defense +2 if he is within 6 squares of an opposing character. // Ursa Major modifies his attack +2 if he is adjacent to more than one opposing character.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF TIME
special_powers.description: When Kang the Conqueror hits, give him a Time token. // FREE: For each of Kang the Conqueror's Time tokens, choose a distinct combat value and modify that value +1 until your next turn. // FREE: Remove up to 3 Time tokens. If you did, heal Kang the Conqueror that many clicks.

special_powers.name: FOR SCIENCE!
special_powers.description: This game, when a friendly character with the A.I.M. keyword hits a character that hasn't been hit this turn, instead of dealing normal damage you may gain 2 MISSION POINTS. If M.O.D.O.K. is KO'd, gain 1 MISSION POINT instead.

special_powers.name: FINDING COMPETENT ASSISTANCE CAN BE SO TEDIOUSLY LABORIOUS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind. When M.O.D.O.K. uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a bystander from this card. If M.O.D.O.K. has Leadership displayed on his dial, or a 6 was rolled, you may instead generate one of each of the bystanders. // Bystanders generated by M.O.D.O.K. gain the A.I.M. keyword.

special_powers.name: KILLER ILLUMINATION
special_powers.description: Pulse Wave, but only opposing characters within range can't use powers or abilities and friendly characters aren't targeted. // When M.O.D.O.K. hits, after resolutions heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: SUMMONING MY FAVORITE HEROES!
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate a bystander on his card. Each bystander on this card can only be generated once per turn.

special_powers.name: THAT BLAST CAME FROM MY MIND!
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Rick Jones uses it, he may also deal his printed damage value to hit characters given an action token.

special_powers.name: CYCLING THROUGH HEROES
special_powers.description: When Blazing Skull is KO'd, after resolutions Rick Jones generates a Captain America bystander.

special_powers.name: CYCLING THROUGH HEROES
special_powers.description: When Captain America is KO'd, after resolutions Rick Jones generates a Namor bystander.

special_powers.name: CYCLING THROUGH HEROES
special_powers.description: When Namor is KO'd, after resolutions Rick Jones generates a Blazing Skull bystander.

special_powers.name: WHOSOEVER HOLDS THIS HAMMER, IF HE BE WORTHY, SHALL POSSESS THE POWER OF THOR
special_powers.description: CLOSE/RANGE: If the Mjolnir special marker is not on the map, make a close/range attack targeting a single opposing character within range and line of fire, regardless of adjacency, modifying attack and damage +1. After resolutions, generate a Mjolnir special marker in a square adjacent to the hit target.

special_powers.name: MJOLNIR
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if the Mjolnir special marker wasn't generated this turn, draw a line of fire between it and Thor regardless of characters or terrain. If you do, remove the Mjolnir special marker from the map and destroy all pieces of blocking terrain along that line of fire then make a close attack targeting all opposing characters that occupy a square along that line of fire, regardless of adjacency.
